title: Video Game Quiz by Chapman Lee and Joan 'Pach' Mira

questions.question: What is the Konami Code?
answers: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Left, Right, Right, Start, Enter
Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A, Start
Start, Select, Left, Right, Left, Right, Up, Down, Up, Down

questions.question: What is the name of Chris Redfield's sister?

answers: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
